titles.title: What Shall I Render to the LORD

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What shall I render to the LORD, what shall my offering be, for all the gracious benefits He has bestowed on me?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Salvation's cup my soul will take while to the LORD I pray, and with His people I will meet, my thankful vows to pay.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: The sacrifice of praise I bring while to the LORD I pray, and with His people I will meet, my thankful vows to pay.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Within His house, the house of pray'r, my soul shall bless the LORD, and praises to His holy Name let all His saints accord.
